dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4704 IH: To expand the PROTECT Our Children Act of 2008 to include combating the transfer of permanent custody or control of a minor in contravention of a required legal procedure, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Eddie Bernice Johnson of Texas (for herself and Mr. Langevin) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To expand the PROTECT Our Children Act of 2008 to include combating the transfer of permanent custody or control of a minor in contravention of a required legal procedure, and for other purposes.

section.header: Expansion of definition of child exploitation
section.text: Paragraph (1) of section 2 of the PROTECT Our Children Act of 2008 ( 42 U.S.C. 17601(1) ) is amended by inserting before the period at the end the following: , or the offer to engage or engaging in the transfer of permanent custody or control of a minor in contravention of a required legal procedure.
